title: Reduced Rune Pricing Error
body: So i'm trying to purchase runes since they are now 10 IP and i can finally buy 90 for the price of 1 so as i click to purchase some i get a error saying that i have purchased to enough of that item... which i don't understand as to why since i am just going to get them all anyways so what does it matter how many i buy now i just want them, can someone shed some light on this matter please?
